title: 360 Given Airline Pant - Provides the ultimate solution for hot weather riding!
description:
Pant Features:
-RAP (Rider Attack Position) Construction for a Precise Fit on the Bike
-Large hole polyester mesh main body construction for unmatched airflow
-Vented TPR Thigh & Knee Logos for Enhanced Airflow
-Active Stretch Knee Panels for Unrestricted Movement on the Bike
-Double Layer Knee System Utilizes a Durable Inner Material with Heat & Abrasion Resistant Leather Outer Panels
-Quad Stretch Rear Yoke Allows the Pant to Move With the Rider
